thanks Mike!  I am trying to just spread the word regarding the hard work and dedication of those on this board.  If everyone continues to share their research we just may make major strides!
   
  

"M.A. Coletta (Mike)" <michaelcoletta@...> wrote:
          I heard your interview today, Juli. Very nice!

- Mike
